headline: Assessing Philip Morris International (NYSE:PM) Valuation After Its Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Run
summary: Market context and recent performance Philip Morris International (PM) has quietly put together a strong run, with the stock up around 31% year to date and roughly 81% over the past 3 years, outpacing many defensive names. See our latest analysis for Philip Morris International. With the latest share price at $158.41 and a strong year to date share price return alongside a robust multi year total shareholder return, momentum still looks constructive as investors warm to Philip Morris...
